changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO PERSONS(ID,FULL_NAME,BIRTHDATE,GENDER,CRUSH,DESCRIPTION) values (1, 'Vassily Petrov','22.12.1993', 'MEN', 'WOMEN','WTF wtf'), (2, 'Pjotr Vasechkin','21.12.1993', 'MEN', 'WOMEN','Lol lol'), (3, 'Kate dfg','20.12.1993', 'WOMEN', 'MEN','Lol lol'), (4, 'Ginger dfg ','25.12.1993', 'WOMEN', 'MEN','Lol lol'); INSERT INTO PERSONS_TO_PERSONS(ID,USER_ID,CRUSH_ID) values (1,1,3), (2,2,3), (3,3,1), (4,1,2);
